channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟠 15:24 The threat of use of the adhesive application
item.description: 🟠 15:24 The threat of use of the adhesive application This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
